backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining News, Review, and UserProfile types with CRUD operations for news articles (admin-only), reviews (user-only), and user profiles, including role-based access control and article expiration logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the Google AdSense script tag has been added to frontend/index.html with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, describing their purpose and recent changes across components, pages, hooks, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including background, foreground, accent, chart, and sidebar color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Single HTML entry point for the React SPA titled 'AP Insight News', including the Google AdSense script tag in the head and a root div for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router setup with routes for home, political, movies, article detail, admin, and admin reviews pages, all wrapped in a root layout with Header, Footer, and ActorLoadingGuard.
frontend/src/components/ActorLoadingGuar: Guard component that blocks child rendering until the backend actor is ready, showing a spinner while loading and an error state with a retry button if the actor fails to connect.
frontend/src/components/AdBanner.tsx: AdSense banner component supporting horizontal (728×90) and rectangle (300×250) formats, initializing adsbygoogle on mount with silent error handling for ad blockers.
frontend/src/components/ArticleCard.tsx: Article card component with four display variants (featured, newspaper, default, compact) that renders article images from `article.imageData` with category badges, author, and date metadata.
Renders a single news article as a compact list item with thumbnail, category badge, title, summary, author, and date, linking to the article detail page.
frontend/src/components/BreakingNewsTick: Displays a horizontally scrolling breaking news ticker bar showing the latest 10 article titles as links, falling back to a default tagline if no news is loaded.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand logo, description, quick navigation links, category links, copyright notice, and a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the sticky site header with a breaking news ticker, logo, current date, desktop/mobile navigation links, and admin action buttons.
frontend/src/components/TopStoriesSideba: Displays a sidebar with the top 5 articles as numbered links and a rectangle ad banner below the list.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, initializing it with an authenticated or anonymous identity and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including fetching, adding, and deleting news articles and reviews, as well as purging expired articles.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes and news-specific design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page for managing news articles, providing a form to add articles with image upload and controls to delete or purge expired articles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReviewsPage.tsx: Admin page that lists all user reviews across articles with the ability to delete individual reviews via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Full article detail page displaying article content, expiry status, related articles, and a reviews section where authenticated users can submit star ratings and text reviews.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page displaying a hero article, secondary stories, and category sections (political, movie news) with skeleton loading states and ad banners.
frontend/src/pages/MovieNewsPage.tsx: Page displaying paginated movie news articles in a list layout with a top stories sidebar, skeleton loading, and a 'Load More' button.
frontend/src/pages/PoliticalNewsPage.tsx: Page displaying paginated political news articles in a list layout with a top stories sidebar, skeleton loading, and a 'Load More' button.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (oklch-based design tokens, news-specific palette), fonts (Roboto, Telugu), shadows, border radii, and plugins (typography, container queries, animate).
project_state.json: Project state metadata for 'AP Insight News' tracking schema version, existing features, and a pending feature request to add a Google AdSense script tag to the HTML head.
